Testable.org is a platform for online experiments, used by PPLS to support student dissertations. In this recorded seminar, Octavian introduces the Testable platform, how to program a simple experiment, and how to integrate the platform with the SONA system used for the Psychology Participant Pool  

:::lo
**LEARNING OBJECTIVES**

1. Understand how to create a Testable experiment.
1. Understand how to link Testable experiments to the SONA system.
:::
